title: How to Build the Right Infrastructure for AI | Computerworld Resource Library
text:
How to Build the Right Infrastructure for AI
AI is transforming life as we know it. But the promise of AI will never be realized without a new approach to the underlying infrastructure that supplies the extraordinary compute demands of AI. IDC has crafted a blueprint of key digital infrastructure requirements that can guide platform engineers as they look for answers. A powerful capability that can deliver the results that many are seeking is the ability to rapidly provision GPU clusters automatically for both AI training and inference workloads. It’s a tall order, however, IT decision-makers are finding Vultr technology capable of meeting these demanding requirements.
